description:
Quilted and cozy winter boots to help them make the most of their snow days. Trudging up sled hills is a lot better with warm and dry feet. With multiple layers of weather protection, the Puffrider do a great job of keeping the cold out and the warm in.

  • Equipped with KEEN.Dry™ waterproof, breathable membrane
  • PFC-free DWR finish shakes off light rain and keeps the boots looking cleaner, longer
  • Insulated with 200g of KEEN.Warm™ synthetic insulation for cold weather protection on winter’s days
  • Stretchy bungee lace lock system provides slip-on comfort
  • Heat shield footbed captures and reflects body heat
  • Insoles are infused with an anti-odour treatment
  • Supportive EVA midsole offers lightweight comfort
  • Keen.Fusion chunky rubber sole clears snow and mud with ease
  • Keen rates these boots down to -32°C
name: Keen Puffrider Waterproof Winter Boots - Children to Youths
